name: Zoe Walker
text: Staff was amazing. Went there in Halloween and was given free candy as well. Pizza was delicious as well. Definitely becoming my go to spot!

text: Our office ordered from here for lunch. Staff was really friendly. Pizzas tased great! (Side note: These are thin crust pizza.) We did BYO so everybody could get the toppings they wanted. …More

name: carlos cabrera
text:
Fantastic food, this is my go to spot when I want some quality lunch.
I enjoyed using their trash can also

name: Noelle Law
text: Always loved coming here from back when Prince was working here but after he left they found an adequate replacement, Key is amazing! My kids always looking forward to "Mr. Key" making their simple pies to perfection. Keep up the great work!

name: Jason
text: I was very pleasantly surprised with how good this place was.  I was a little skeptical with the high (4.7) rating, but gave it a try.  Build your own pizzas is the lates craze in the fast casual eating world and this place does it just …More

name: jill Harte
text: Went to Livingston Blaze today and the employees were so friendly and great. They were helping out each other and i was so happy with their level of camaraderie. During this touch times impressing people like i was is the way to go!!

name: Sunflower
text: I entered the store that had no direction to it. I was pointed to the pickup shelf. Order was just put on the shelf. When we arrived home both pizza’s were burnt. Drove 25 minutes to get this because it looks good on website. BF liked his …More

name: Rey Viqueira
text: Service was really fast. For now only take out is available and you can walk in with a mask and order your stuff. Nice meal for ten bucks.

name: Zoe Saladina
text: This place is truly amazing. The pizza blew my mind and the staff was so great. Definitely will come back

name: Lucy McDonald
text: This is my favorite spot to get pizza because the staff are so nice and jovial there especially my friend Michael. Continue doing a great job guys!

name: Daniel Tarnovskiy
text: Horrible staff and service. The staff were very rude and disrespectful. Do not recommend at all!

name: Christina Hewitt
text: I was able to easily craft a healthy vegan pie, love the spicy red sauce! fresh healthy topping options. Will return. Great for vegans and those who have dietary restrictions.

name: Richard Morales

name: Snehal Desai

text: Khyri is outstanding!  We love the pizza here - would highly recommend!  Great food and customer service.

name: Yasmine Carter
text: Felt safe going in. Order was just put on the shelf. Quick and easy

name: Rachel Gossett
text: My family and I come to Blaze once a week.  The employees and service are wonderful.  The pizza is delicious and a great price!  Never a disappointment!  Shout out to Zaire who is one of the amazing employees.

name: Grace Trupia
text: I’m a Wayne blaze pizza go-er. But during these circumstances Livingston was open, so I decided to give it a go. I ordered on the app and was able to get my pizza so easily. I walked in AND THERE IT WAS. Right in front of my eyes. I grabbed …More

name: Jennifer Bradford
text: Kiara was kind enough to offer us a free dessert for giving our review. This is our first time at a Blaze Pizza. We really enjoyed it. The cauliflower crust was delicious, and the variety of toppings was more than enough to choose from. My …More

name: Eric Williams
text: Service was quick and easy. Pizza was outstanding

name: quianda Dyer
text: I had an amazing experience at Blaze Pizza in Livingston. The service was top notch! Friendly and fast and it's super clean! The food is amazing! I'm definately going back. If you  have been what are you waiting for?

name: Kecia Coachman
text: Cooked liked i asked.. although employee didnt know if they provided sanitizer...hmmm ... they did!

name: Suma
text: This is our second time to Blaze pizza in Livingston. Since the one in Willowbrook closes at 9:00 PM, we went here for a quick bite. We ordered online a couple of gluten free pizzas, non-veg and veg. I like my veg pizza with a variety of …More

name: Karen Obertan
text: The Scanner always seem to give me problems for my rewards but that was my only problem. the manager helped me out and my experience from beginning to end was great!

name: Shanice H
text: Delicious thin crust pizza. Attentive staff & fast service!

name: Sharmila lala
text: We love coming here as a family. Love the service and attentiveness of people working here. My son loves the veg out pizza and I love the squash salad. And Zaire was extremely helpful with my order.

name: M Styles
text: I was able to easily craft a healthy vegan pie, love the spicy red sauce! fresh healthy topping options. Will return. Great for vegans and those who have dietary restrictions.

name: Wes Gossett
text: We love Blaze. Any time some one asks us about a gift card we say we want one from Blaze because we eat here so often. Everyone in our family love it! Thanks to Ziare for helping me at the register tonight.

name: Marshawn Windle
text: Great pizza;even better staff

name: Can Ozturk
text: Blaze Pizza @ Livingston is one of our favorite pizza places. Since it has the best gluten free dough with no after taste, we love the place and come often to eat at. I also love the Aqua Fresca's with low sugar and low calories...

name: Sarah Lucus
text: I come here often and most of the time the have few staff. However, they are very nice and work as fast as they can. They are really unmatched. I am always amazed how they do it. I love coming here. Great pizza made by great people.

name: Jared Walker
text: Pretty cool spot to grab some great pizza

name: Galiano Taymes
text: Josh was amazing. Great customer service always on point. Thank you for always making my experience the best. He deserves a raise will keep coming!

name: Olander Wilson
text: The food was amazing but the staff was phenomenal!!!! I’m definitely coming back. Customer service was A-1 and very very down to earth people. I’m definitely a fan! I’ll be back time and time again not only for the pizza but just to hang out with the staff :)

name: Jerel Cummings
text: I come here often with my family. Really good pizza. Edward- the store manager is the best! He always takes good care of us whenever we come in.

name: Jada Wise
text: The customers service is really great. I was having a hard time with the app and the manager took time to explain everything to me. And the pizza is great too! What a place.

name: Sarah Tristian
text: The manager Khyri was awesome. She helped me make my pie to perfection. It was a great experience. Will definitely be back!

name: Julie London
text: Blaze Pizza Livingston is great!! The pizza was delicious. And the service was fast and friendly. We can’t wait to come back.  Thanks Blaze.

name: Jennica Drice
text: Customer service was excellent and the food even better. Plus they have smore cookies yimmy. The half pizza and salad deal was just right for me.

name: Kimberly Walker
text: Awesome service. Thank you Khyri!

name: Ally Foster
text:
I love this place and their food. Everything is under $10 and very affordable.

name: david lam
text: Came in right as they were closing and they showed exemplary service! Great food, low wait time, and very nice staff. Josh, Michael and Romeo were awesome!

name: Mike Patt
text: Came here last night and they were pretty busy. However they handled everything great. My pizza was out in a timely manner and tasted great!

name: Arpit Gawande

name: Robert Gore
text: Today was the last time I set foot in this location. The last time I visited the attitude from the employee taking the order was incredible.  I thought she must have had a bad day but when I received a similar experience today...it is …More

name: Zola Martin
text: The general manager Khyri was so nice. I made a mistake on my son's pie and she fix it for me free of charge. This place is amazing.

text: Pizza was good...service was average

name: Ariel Guevarez
text: I just ordered the veg out & it was excellent. The woman who made my pie was patient & kind & very knowledgeable about the menu items. Best customer service I’ve had in a long time. I’ll be coming back for sure

text: I came here a couple days ago and the manager Khyri was so nice. She helped me make my pie and also checked on me at my table. Great service and food.

text: When I came in I was greeted very nice. My pizza was made fast and looked great. It tasted even better!

name: Star Gholston
text: Keyshawn was great! Pizza amazing

name: John Brady
text: Had the best food and experience tonight at the Livingston Blaze pizza. The staff was extremely friendly and food presentation was great. Assata sorry for miss spelling this wonderful workers name. She takes great pride in her job. Highly recommend this place to Eat.

text: Store hours are out the window... came from Newark to find out they decided shut everything down early today.

name: Carla Williams

name: francisco granados

name: Rich Webb
text: Truly enjoyed everything. The pizza was so good.

name: Youri Gourin
text: The manager was so helpful today. There was a little wait but he explained to me it was because of the amount of online orders they got from a new large pizza promotion. We had a lovely chat and he explained the app to me and how to earn my flames and showed me all the new promotion coming soon. Will definitely be a regular now.

name: Tejas Nadkarni
text: Fast and delicious pizza. Love it.

name: Sam Gossett
text: While in town we took our grandson to his favorite pizza place. He loves it. Was pretty good pizza and service.

name: Destiny Taylor
text: I had an wonderful experience visiting this restaurant. The service was phenomenal and the food was great. The manager Khyri also made my experience an everlasting one. I would definitely recommend this restaurant and will be returning soon.

name: Aaliyah Paul
text: I really enjoyed the gluten free pizzas offered at this location. I was helped by one of the employees , Josh. He was very informative and understanding ! The service and food was awesome , will be visiting again with my daughter !

name: Janaya Richards
text: The food was great, I really enjoyed it. The manager Khyri was very nice and made sure I enjoyed my time there. I will definitely keep coming back.

name: Bryanna Espinosa
text: Service was prompt. The guys were very nice and helpful. My pizza was perfect

name: Junior Garcia

text: This pizza was very good, but the service was a bit weak. We visited on a Saturday evening and the place was packed, so maybe that was the cause of the slow service. name: Wen Dior

name: makayla jones
text: This place is so nice and they have great customer service. The manager Khyri was also very helpful, I will definitely be going back to this place.

text: The place is amazing, very respectful staff. The worker getting my order, Kyron, was very helpful and professional.

name: Jessica Sental
text: Blaze pizza is excellent! I love that you can build your own and the topping choices are extensive. It's set up like Chipotle where you follow your pizza down the line as your topping choices are added. Then they slide it into the brick oven! Mine was delicious! I was pleasantly surprised and will be going back often!

name: Susan Muller
text: I love going to Blaze with my husband there are many topics and new options of crust and really is accommodating to all diets. If you go to the one in Livingston NJ, you are almost certainly going to meet Keyshawn. Every time we come he’s …More

name: Theo
text: The top on the condiments was loose. Went to pour some cheese and it falls out and ruins the pizza. After advising staff and then stating they'd make another, I had to remind them to make it roughly 10-mins later when I noticed no one was making it.

name: Kenny Johnson
text: Everytime I come here it is v always great!

name: Vevin Kumar
text: Awesome pizzas with freshly made dough. Tried their BBQ chicken pizza and would love to visit again.

name: Bill L
text: Nice fast casual pizza. At peak times wait can be a bit long but expected given that they are customizing your pizza. Even at it's slowest sti faster than traditional pizza. Their WiFi has never worked and they also play loud music and keep …More

text: My first time here and I was blown away. Everyone was so nice and the pizza is awesome!

name: Angela Cooper
text: I have been here a few times and the food is always great. This evening was easily the best visit though. There was a wonderful employee, Dejaunah, she went above and beyond. name: Rein Johnson
text: This pizza was awesome. Can’t wait until PI Day

name: Bennticha Insaf

name: Terrel Smith
text: Keyshawn is the most hard working, most pleasant employee you’ll ever meet. Plus they make the best pizza in NJ.

text: First time here. One of the best pizza restaurants I’ve been too. Friendly atmosphere and staff. Special thanks to Asatta who made it worth while!!! Keep it going Blaze pizza!!!

text: Customizable pizza with numerous topping options? Why yes I will pile high with toppings and sauces. Typically a good spot for a quick pizza fix.

text: Today was my first visit ever to blaze with my family. We got just pepperoni pizzas as we were unsure about it but it was so good we ordered another. Unfortunately that one got burnt but that’s when our MVP for the night stepped in. …More

text: Today I was especially impressed with speed of making of pizzas. My friend, Keyshawn made sure we was well taken care of also checking up on us and telling us about the deals on the app. Love this place.

We LOVE the vegan options, but man, this place is dirty.
floor is always sticky, food and old leftovers are on the floor, under the tables not just from recent customers. also, the bathroom is always dirty and I try …More

name: Shauna McArdle
text: Blaze pizza is delicious and a bargain. With vegan options it’s a perfect place to grab a quick bite. Just be sure to double check your order as they’ve  made mistakes on more than one occasion with my pie. Not giving me vegan cheese, not giving me high rise, etc.

name: Barabara Jones
text: Great pizza and staff was excellent

name: Felix Lu
text: “Fast” pizza in NJ...why bother when there’s so much authentic east coast pizza around? That’s what I thought. I was wrong. Blaze is GOOD. I’m hooked! Even more impressive...the crew is fast, friendly, and efficient. I used to run a few …More

name: Miriam Banks Farrakhan
text: Great customer service with Asatta & Shaonda!!! Thank you very much and keep up the good work ladies...

name: John Soroka
text: My universal go-to for pizza or when I’m just really hungry, blaze offers personal pizzas made from freshly made dough, topped right in front of you, and baked in their ovens. Great atmosphere, cheerful and nice workers, and sweet beverages. I’m always down for some blaze.

name: Frenel Legentus
text: I love Blaze pizza, it’s a great restaurant, great staff, great customer service and, great food. I felt welcomed from the time I walked in. I was greeted by a woman named Morgan Minatee, who is an excellent employee. She is a great team leader and makes sure the customers are always taken care of. I definitely recommend Blaze Pizza.

name: Keith Lopez
text: Alex was a great help and actually brightened my day! So charasmatic. The rest of the staff were friendly as well 🙌🏾. Super clean restaurant.

name: Tasha Mack
text: Great service!

text:
Very good service and great food

name: Qing Chen

text: So so so good. They have half a pizza with a side salad that's a great lunch. Highly recommend

name: India Allen
text: It's a great place to grab fresh pizza. The employees are always friendly and they make your pizza right.

name: quentin williams
text: Pizza is excellent and so is the customer service.  Aaran was exponentially nice and helpful after asking him so many questions!  Great place

name: Toni Hamilton
text:
Came into blaze Pizza looking for a slice. First time here. Got a “build your oown pizza” and it was absolutely delicious! The people here were friendly and helpful and I will definitely be back!
Check them out! You won’t be disappointed.

name: Carlos Poupart
text: I love how the the dairy-free cheese and crust options for those who can't eat dairy. It's allergy friendly and delicious!

name: chris M
text: Not only did my pizza taste great I was impressed with the service. Mandy and Asatta are two of the nicest, funniest people. They work together so nicely. They had all the guests laughing but they were making the pizzas so fast while doing …More

name: Thalia Palmer
text: Overall, my experience at Blaze has been great. The staff is very friendly and goes the extra mile to get your order right. Special shout out to Dejaunah, who is always cheerful and upbeat when she sees a guest walk through the door. Blaze is lucky to have her as an employee because she embodies excellent customer service!

name: tyler thompson
text: Came in for some pizza, left with an experience. The pizza was phenomenal, the sea salt and oregano truly make all the difference. Shout out to one of the workers there Aaran he gave me excellent service when I was there. 5/5 will eat again.

name: Lan
text:
Very clean, fast service.

The build your own pizza is lit 🔥 so worth the price because you can put an …More

name: Noelle Law
text: Went with the family on New Years Day (gotta have pizza to start the new year off). And, regardless of it being a holiday that no one wants to work, the service was so pleasant -- especially from Prince who somehow always makes our pizzas with a smile. We love this Blaze!

name: Jeff Tanenbaum
text: Delaunah was great.  She even sat with us to see how we enjoyed our meal.  Great energy and great food.

name: Latarsha Mitchell
text: Asatta was phenomenal! Great customer service! I will definitely be a regular from now on.

name: Richard Hayward
text: I love the pizza and drinks here ... all very unique. But the staff is really great. Most are hard working and multi tasking ... like my new friend Prince. Baby, he's a star!  He cooked my pizza perfectly, took payment and even helped me …More

text: This place is makes the best pizzas

name: Jacob Tucker
text: I often go here with my family! Great service!

name: Hsinyi Chen
text: delicious !

name: eric guo
text: The staff is so friendly and awesome! The pizza is delicious! I love how you can "make" your own pizza by picking which toppings. The line is usually short. Come on March 14th (3/14- Pie/Pi Day) for pizzas only $3.14!

name: Sakshi Dave
text: We had a great experience! Kishan was very good.

name: Joan Olszewski
text: First time ever...yummy, fast, friendly.

name: KARIM LANNAMAN
text: Pizza is great, but service is inconsistent depending on staff on duty. Staff doesn't shine during busy surges. Pizza isn't always made as instructed, and I wish they made extra cheese a topping, because its very difficult to get alot of cheese on a simple pie pizza even if you are willing to pay extra as an additional topping.

name: Timothy Lee
text: Love the pizza and the staff.  Dejaunah has me laughing every time I visit. She and the team are awesome!

Btw this is Mitchell
this place is the best pizza place i’ve ever had

name: Evin Cooper
text: Living in Jersey my entire life I've only ever had authentic Jersey pizza but once I tried Blaze in Livingston I was blown away! Prince was absolutely amazing and helped me with the app and picking what was best to eat. The service was …More

name: Jessica Barnes
text: The food is always great here but today Keyshawn and Reshawn was a lot of fun and they really work well together. Good job guys

name: Eddie Cintron
text: I was a little worried about going there during an abbreviated lunch but was pleasantly surprised. Got there around noon and the place was relatively quiet and getting a custom single pizza was quick and easy.  Seating was ample and comfortable.  Pizza was good. Will definitely do it again.

name: Kendra Samson
text: Keyshawn was great as usual and even knows what I get before I say it.

name: Kenneth Feibush
text: Gluten free pizza at most places tastes like card board. I’m a New Yorker and I’ve had real pizza. Blaze’s GF option is impressive. The employees are courteous and entertaining.

name: Alex Rosario
text: Great service and great food!

name: Khadijah Aminah
text: Omg food was great! Service was even better.. Asatta was lively and made me feel so welcomed.

name: Ousman Touray

name: Mark Goldberg

name: Tanmay Chaudhary
text: Awesome, no better Pizza than this. Once you have it can't forget that taste. Very delicious customised pizza.

name: Jayden Hardy
text: Dejaunah & Morgan were amazing! They provided excellent service as they were closing. 5 STARS!

name: Ashley Coto
text: The pizza was amazing and the lemonade was even better!! Definitely reccomend coming to this location. Jeff was super kind and helpful at checkout.

text: I started going to Blaze for the pizza but now I'm hooked on the salad.  What a great spot to eat with even better service and workers.  Especially Dejaunah, shes my salad technician.

name: Roisin Cahill
text: My friend took me here and it was such a yummy meal! All of the workers were very kind and they asked if you liked the amount of cheese, toppings, etc. on your pizza and do not charge for any extra! Definitely come here!

name: Matt Williams
text: Dejaunah is a great employee here at Blaze Pizza. Great food and great service. Will come back.

name: Tawanna Saxton
text:
Great Food & Service!!
I love the buffalo chicken pizza. The staff is so nice and helpful. Special thanks to Treasure for the great suggestion. I definitely have to come back next week.

name: Kim Littlefield
text: the Staff here is awesome.

name: Amal Elmogahzy
text: AMAZING experience! The pizza was wonderful and the staff were so friendly and helpful! The general manager Ricardo was so friendly and checked in on every table when we were there. Will definitely be back!

name: Jibril Moses
text: Service is stupendous, and the food is even better. The people there are really friendly, especially Aaran, he always make sure to greet me when I order and come across as someone who does his job well and excellently. The s’mores are really good too, just saying.

name: Linda M
text: Morgan, Dejaunah and Rashaun all helped me place my order. They were friendly, polite and extremely professional. …More

name: Randy Ulerio
text: Food is awesome. Get an everything pie and go balls to the wall with all the veggies and meats you can handle....the new manager makes sure the pizza was correct and customized the way i wanted it....when it comes to pizza this place rocks!

name: Rachel Leskanic
text: The family loves coming to Blaze! Really great atmosphere, and a great addition to the town. Pizza always comes out quickly and the staff is great. Very welcoming, always smiling. One of the employees, Khyri, is always such a sweetheart. She’s always smiling. They’re also very accommodating with food allergies.

name: Dione Trent
text: 2nd time at the Livingston location...service was great & food is awesome. We ate in and Morgan & Dejaunah were very attentive & friendly during our stay. Thumbs up!!

name: Cal Gonzalez
text: Fantastic crew. We were stuck in the snowstorm 11.15.18.. this crew was pumping out pizzas for all their customers,  while Shake shack next door was closed with the employees just sitting around.    So good I've even written a letter to corporate. ..

name: Island Gyal
text: Standing there talking on their phones instead of doing taking my order

name: martin feuer
text: Pizzas are small and it is fast food. What is awesome that being said it is fresh the perfect size for personal pizzas. The place is set up for each person to order what they want and no fighting over toppings sauce etc. The employees are awesome know their stuff and dead on. Place is clean  and food is very good!!

name: Norman Jones
text: It's always great to be able to customize your own pie

name: Daniel Reyes
text: Today I had Dejaunah help me out at Blaze and made me quite possibly the most perfect pizza I've gotten at a Blaze location. Amount of sauce and cheese was just right, all my toppings were evenly distributed and balanced and it was fired to perfection. I even put it up on my instagram story!

name: Daron Redd
text: The best franchise pizza on the face of the earth. And I am at the Livingston, NJ location where I’m always treated well by the lovely Asiata.

name: Diana Garrett
text: We love Blaze Pizza in Livingston! Aaran always takes great care of us and makes the best pies. He recognizes us when we come in, knows our names and our favorite orders. Aaran is the best!

name: O. Frederick
text: Love, love, love this place.  The pizza is excellent and the staff is outstanding, all of them.  Of special note are Manager Joe, who is very nice and friendly, and Khyri, who is so good and careful with my son's allergy pizza.  We go at …More

text: Visited the other day. The pizza was great and an employee Aaran was really helpful when I did not really understand the format of the restaurant. Would eat here again.

text: One of my new favorite spots. I've been to this one and one in Downtown Baltimore and the pizza is right around what you would call thin crust, the price is just about what you would spend at a Chipotle and you order somewhat like a Chipotle type restaurant offers as well. I definitely recommend the meat lovers to start first.
